data.what_is: Our industry-leading global resources, technical expertise and industry knowledge are delivered locally through more than 500 offices in more than 120 countries.
data.product_description: Our industry-leading global resources, technical expertise and industry knowledge are delivered locally through more than 500 offices in more than 120 countries.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent consulting and great company for human resource and health solutions
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Aon Consulting helped with:
I was part of health and welfare and it has excellent professionals and has in depth knowledge of product , had an opportunity simplify task to support client request along with best talent pool and provided great health care service to number of client. It has all tools that require to perform at optimum level and it takes care of project and its dedication  is unparallel in current market.

What do you like best about Aon Consulting?
It is leading  company that provide best services to its client in multiple domain and it does takes care of its employees  really well. I had great time working with Aon.  I worked for healthcare domain - it gave excellent training and provide all tools to perform daily project and task efficiently and it takes care of its headcount like no other.
I would rate Aon as A+ company in the world. its Training is far better than in the current market.

What do you dislike about Aon Consulting?
I don't have any word for dislike . it understand business and market scenario.

Recommendations to others considering Aon Consulting:
It's best service provider and has best talent pool and resource and dedicated firm with honest leadership gives you best services in current market.Aon knows what market demand and clients need and it's evolving firm.

What problems is Aon Consulting solving and how is that benefiting you?
supported healthcare participant issue, collaborate with vendor and understood how healthcare sector works and what skills needed in order to execute task, analytical skills and problem solving skills and don't forget communication skills as well. I learned all that in my tenure. it has excellent resource and tools to execute requirement and fit has helped me to sharpen my leadership skills and helped me with  functional skills .

Describe the project or task Aon Consulting helped with:
Aon Hewitt Consulting has helped us with our open enrollment. When we are in lock down season, Aon assists us with how to get more customers into the system during open enrollment time period.

What do you like best about Aon Consulting?
What we like the best about Aon Hewitt Consulting is that they work all hours. Since customers would be in different time zones, they are willing to work around the clock, which is nice.

What do you dislike about Aon Consulting?
What we dislike about Aon Hewitt Consulting are the politics that we have to work around. That comes with every company and it's hard to navigate.

Recommendations to others considering Aon Consulting:
We would recommend Aon Hewitt Consulting to others that might be considering to hire them as well. They are very good at making goals and trying to reach them to the best of their ability. We are trying to get more customers into the system during open enrollment season for their help on benefits administration services.

Describe the project or task Aon Consulting helped with:
Helping to implement compliant staffing policies and standards.

What do you like best about Aon Consulting?
Aon is an industry leading consultancy with historical experience in the industries and countries we seek to operate in.

What do you dislike about Aon Consulting?
For a medium size companies the fees can be expensive and sometimes lead t redundant analysis.

Recommendations to others considering Aon Consulting:
Customer service can be appalling depending on who you come accross, but the output is insightful
